pages.text: The Heating Crucible converts blocks into liquid when heated above 1000°C. Insert items through a hopper or other automated method into the top, pipe the fluid out the sides, then heat it through the bottom. It consumes a constant 10°C/t while above 1000°C whether running or not.
While it can run at any temperature above 1000°C, it is 5 times as fast at 1500°C and above.
